description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/2m94o (compensated affiliate link) - Minix has a great new fanless Mini PC that performs quite well for its price point. Great build quality and great performance. See more Mini PCs:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItE_zvA8tShvdxgCEL648ZY and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

title: A Great Fanless Mini PC with an Intel N100 CPU: Minix Z100-0db Review
